## Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've built genuine connections with many of you while playing a balanced game that respected everyone's position. 

While I've made strategic moves when necessary, I've never been deceptive or manipulative. I've tried to earn my place here through honest gameplay and real conversations.

I hope you'll vote based on who played with integrity while still making smart moves to advance. I believe my balanced approach of authenticity and strategy makes me deserving of your vote.

Jury, throughout this game I've played openly, honestly, and respectfully. I formed genuine connections, stayed true to my word, and navigated carefully without betraying trust. P7 played well too, but I believe my consistent integrity and fairness set me apart. If you value authenticity, cooperation, and respectful gameplay, please vote to keep me. I'd be honored to have your support and earn the win together. Thanks for a great game, everyone!
